title: Ex-Wife of Eric Greitens, Missouri Senate Candidate, Accuses Him of Abuse - The New York Times
content:
1. Ex-Wife of Eric Greitens, Missouri Senate Candidate, Accuses Him of Abuse  The New York Times
  2. Former Missouri Gov. Eric Greitens, now Republican Senate candidate, accused of abuse by ex-wife  KMBC 9
  3. Ex-wife accuses top Missouri GOP Senate candidate of abuse  The Associated Press - en Espa√±ol
  4. Ex-wife of Missouri GOP Senate candidate Eric Greitens alleges he physically abused her and their children  CNN

  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Sheena Greitens said in an affidavit that her former husband had physically abused both her and their young son. Mr. Greitens, a former governor of Missouri, denied the accusation.
